mapper.insert: insert into RCM_NOTICE (ID, TITLE, CONTENT, RELEASE_TIME, EXPIRATION_TIME, RELATION_ID, TYPE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, STATUS) values (#{ID,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{TITLE,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{CONTENT,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{RELEASE_TIME,javaType = java.util.Date,jdbcType= TIMESTAMP}, #{EXPIRATION_TIME,javaType = java.util.Date,jdbcType= TIMESTAMP}, #{RELATION_ID,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{TYPE,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_TIME,javaType = java.util.Date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{CREATE_BY,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{STATUS,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from RCM_NOTICE where RELATION_ID = #{relationId,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from RCM_NOTICE where ID = #{id,javaType = java.lang.String,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select n.* from rcm_notice n,rcm_notice_user nu where n.id = nu.relation_id and n.type = '${type}'
and n.title like '%${title}%'
and n.content like '%${content}%'
and nu.user_id = '${userId}' and n.status = 1 order by to_number(nu.review_status) ,n.RELEASE_TIME desc

select * from ( select n.*,rownum rn from rcm_notice n,rcm_notice_user nu where n.id = nu.relation_id and n.type = '${type}'
and n.title like '%${title}%'
and n.content like '%${content}%'
and nu.user_id = '${userId}' and n.status = 1 order by to_number(nu.review_status) ,n.RELEASE_TIME desc ) t_
where t_.rn <= ${limit}
